pages.text: Schinderhannes is a hurdiid radiodont known from the Devonian of Germany. Its discovery proved that radiodonts had lasted a lot longer than previously thought and that there was a ghost lineage spanning the later Ordovician and Silurian periods. Schinderhannes was likely a predator which swam quickly around to catch smaller prey.
